price: 17. Atau sudah merasa amankah kamu, bahwa Dia yang di langit tidak akan mengirimkan badai yang berbatu kepadamu? Namun kelak kamu akan mengetahui bagaimana (akibat mendustakan) peringatan-Ku.
arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am amintum man fī al-samāi an yur'sila ʿalaykum ḥāṣiban fasataʿlamūna kayfa nadhīri
